mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of James Adair, III as a child in various poses. In three of the poses he is wearing a summer outfit with a scarf tied around the neck. In Pose 2 he is holding a bow. In Pose 4 he is holding a puppy. In Pose 1 he is wearing a white suit with necktie. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society. The plate was inscribed with Jimmie.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of James Adair as a child (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
